tool_description: News articles from around the world in near real-time.
name: World News
title: World News

api_list.name: findNews
api_list.description: Returns news articles according to query parameters

optional_parameters.name: sources
optional_parameters.description: A comma-separated string of identifiers (maximum 20) for the news sources or blogs you want headlines from. Use the /sources endpoint to locate these programmatically or look at the sources index.

optional_parameters.name: dateFrom
optional_parameters.description: A date and optional time for the oldest article allowed. This should be in ISO 8601 format (e.g. 2022-04-21 or 2022-04-21T01:42:02)

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: The 2-letter ISO-639-1 code of the language you want to get headlines for. Possible options: ar de en es fr he it nl no pt ru se ud zh.

optional_parameters.name: dateTo
optional_parameters.description: A date and optional time for the newest article allowed. This should be in ISO 8601 format (e.g. 2022-04-21 or 2022-04-21T01:42:02)

optional_parameters.name: searchIn
optional_parameters.description: The fields to restrict your q search to: Options are title, description, content

optional_parameters.name: pageSize
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to return per page

optional_parameters.name: domains
optional_parameters.description: A comma-separated string of domains (eg bbc.co.uk, techcrunch.com, engadget.com) to restrict the search to.

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description: The order to sort the articles in. Possible options: relevancy, popularity, publishedAt. relevancy = articles more closely related to q come first. popularity = articles from popular sources and publishers come first. publishedAt = newest articles come first. Default: publishedAt

optional_parameters.name: excludeDomains
optional_parameters.description: A comma-separated string of domains (eg bbc.co.uk, techcrunch.com, engadget.com) to remove from the results.

optional_parameters.name: pageNumber
optional_parameters.description: Use this to page through results

api_list.name: getCategories
api_list.description: Returns the news categories we support

optional_parameters.name: pageNumber
optional_parameters.description: Use this to page through results

optional_parameters.name: pageSize
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to return per page

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: Search by slug of category name
